| icon              = poe2 breastplate_armor icon.png
| description       = Breastplates are popular for offering a modest amount of protection without the restrictive movement of heavier mail and full suits of plate armor.

Due to their widespread use by warriors from the Vailian Republics, the fashion of clothing and padding worn under breastplates typically reflects Vailian styles.
